You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Sscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4AE.
  * `&sscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4C8.
